title: Ocean week, what are your point totals?
body:
So as the title says, what are you currently sitting at in terms of how many points you have earned for ocean week?

Personally i'm sitting on 30.

replies.body: 65, gotta love playing on double points every game
37, not amazingly impressive but not bad either:P
10, and I'm going on a holiday so can't get any more. But at least got the 10.
I'd be on like 50 if I realized my smurf wasn't enrolled in the event. But really, why the f*ck did we have to enroll in the first place?
To make it so we are actually earning the rewards instead of just doing what we normally do and getting free shit.
